metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5169 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
If manipulated hyperlinked text with "chrome:" URL contained in it isdragged and dropped on the "home" icon, the home page can be reset toinclude a normally-unlinkable chrome page as one of the home page tabs.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 60.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5169` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '60.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
